mapper.insert: insert into matching_tb(user_id, matching_status, reservation_id, match_user_id) values (#{userId}, #{matchingStatus}, #{reservationId}, #{matchUserId});
mapper.select: select * from matching_tb m left join reservation_tb r on m.user_id = r.user_id left join user_tb u on m.match_user_id = u.id where m.user_id = #{userId} order by r.reservation_date desc;
